00002  * "C++ Templates - The Complete Guide"
00003  * by David Vandevoorde and Nicolai M. Josuttis, Addison-Wesley, 2002
00004  *

00011 
00012 #ifndef CUPP_KERNEL_MAGIC_function_ptr_H
00013 #define CUPP_KERNEL_MAGIC_function_ptr_H
00014 
00015 namespace cupp {
00016 namespace kernel_magic {
00017 
00027 // primary template handles maximum number of parameters:
00028 template<typename P1 = void,
00029          typename P2 = void,
00030          typename P3 = void>
00031 class function_ptr {
00032         public:
00033                 typedef void (*type)(P1,P2,P3);
00034 };
00035 
00036 // partial specialization for two parameters:
00037 template<typename P1,
00038          typename P2>
00039 class function_ptr<P1, P2, void> {
00040         public:
00041                 typedef void (*type)(P1,P2);
00042 };
00043 
00044 // partial specialization for one parameter:
00045 template<typename P1>
00046 class function_ptr<P1, void, void> {
00047         public:
00048                 typedef void (*type)(P1);
00049 };
00050 
00051 // partial specialization for no parameters:
00052 template<>
00053 class function_ptr<void, void, void> {
00054         public:
00055                 typedef void (*type)();
00056 };
00057 
00058 }
00059 }
00060 
00061 #endif //CUPP_KERNEL_MAGIC_function_ptr_H
